jobDescription: The Dow Chemical Laminating Adhesives business has an exciting opportunity in R&D; for a Sr Research Scientist located in Lake Jackson, TX. The Laminating Adhesives business is a part of Dow's Packaging and Specialty Plastics division which is a world leader in new materials innovation for multiple plastics and adhesives markets, particularly for flexible food packaging where our innovations are largely focused on improving sustainability in food distribution. Dow is the largest laminating adhesive supplier globally. Our business portfolio covers a broad variety of product chemistries including polyurethanes, polyesters, acrylics, ethylene vinyl acetate, and polyolefin for a wide range of adhesive applications and substrates.  The purpose of this job is to develop innovative laminating adhesives and coatings to create new business growth in our priority markets globally. The role requires interaction with Technical Service&Development; (TS&D;) and marketing across geographies to understand customer needs and link these to product development; with process R&D;, tech center and product stewardship for the scale-up and regulatory compliance of the products and finally with various account teams and customers for the commercialization of the new technology. Identification of new technology breakthroughs through scouting and external collaboration and shaping of multi-generational product plans is anticipated. The ideal candidate should Strong knowledge of Organic&Polymer; Chemistry and be interested in Synthesis, structural-property relationships, formulation development and working with diverse teams to solve problems to create value.
